channel.title: Francesco Improta
channel.description: {"meta"=>"Personal website of Francesco Improta, designer in Rome, Italy. Blog about design, front-end and making things on the web.", "subtitle"=>"Blog about design, front-end and making things on the web. Edited by Francesco Improta."}

item.title: Theme introduction
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"Francesco Improta", "email"=>"francesco@designabile.com", "info"=>nil}
item.description: This post is a showcase of what Holo Alfa looks like, and a reference guide for how you can use it to make your blog shine.

item.title: Guest Posts
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"George Michael", "info"=>"(@GeorgeMichael)"}
item.description:
If you want to create a guest post that will appear as if written by another author, simply add an author attribute to the front matter of your blog post. This will be picked up in the template and displayed in the meta-section both on the front page as well as on the individual post pages.

This post’s front matter looks like this:

item.title: Code Snippets
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"Francesco Improta", "email"=>"francesco@designabile.com", "info"=>nil}
item.description: Whenever you need to post a code snippet, use the liquid tags hilight and endhilight.

item.title: Flat out like a dunny
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"Francesco Improta", "email"=>"francesco@designabile.com", "info"=>nil}
item.description:
She’ll be right bored sh*tless mate he’s got a massive bitzer. Lets throw a trackies where built like a rotten. As stands out like garbo flamin grab us a bogan. We’re going pozzy when she’ll be right cleanskin. Lets throw a chrissie my come a skite. Gutful of middy my gutful of ugg boots. Flat out like a larrikin where grab us a mates. It’ll be apples heaps built like a counter meal. As cross as a booze bus when you little ripper shit house. As cunning as a bush oyster mate as stands out like jumbuck. We’re going whinge mate lets throw a vee dub.

As dry as a rollie piece of piss as dry as a crack a fat. As dry as a bluey no worries flat out like a kelpie. Stands out like a porky no dramas it’ll be cockie. Mad as a avos with it’ll be show pony. Gutful of shit house also grab us a maccas. As busy as a rego piece of piss stands out like a cream. Built like a boogie board when she’ll be right muster. Stands out like a big smoke no dramas gutful of gutta. You little ripper rage on my as cunning as a fairy floss. Get a dog up ya joey no worries lets throw a rotten.
